meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christine Schreck Brandon Barnes Siddharth Hariharan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7360.

td.p: Christine Schreck, a writer from Berkeley, California
Brandon Barnes, a stock analyst from Tulsa, Oklahoma
Siddharth Hariharan, a student from Herndon, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,601)

tr.td: LITTLE RED CORVETTE
SIGN O' THE TIMES
BAT DANCE
"U" GOT THE LOOK
MY NAME IS PRINCE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'It was equal to about $1.15 & wasn\'t circulating as cash yet when it went into effect on January 1')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: It was equal to about $1.15 & wasn't circulating as cash yet when it went into effect on January 1

Brandon

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Christine] She wrote down "Who is Grisnam?" Were you thinking--)
(Christine: Grisham. It did--)
(Alex: John Grisham.)
(Christine: It didn\'t pick up my "H".)
(Alex: Yeah, John Grisham. A good choice, but incorrect.)
SiddharthWho is Nicholas Sparks?
$66
BrandonWho is
$15,400
ChristineWho is Grisnam?
$14,001
Stephen King')
